### This file is automatically generated by Qt Design Studio.
### Do not change

qt_add_library(content STATIC)

file(GLOB_RECURSE resPng RELATIVE ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}
     "../resources/icons/*.png"
)
list(TRANSFORM resPng PREPEND ../)

file(GLOB_RECURSE resSvg RELATIVE ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}
     "../resources/icons/*.svg"
)
list(TRANSFORM resSvg PREPEND ../)

qt6_add_qml_module(content
    URI "content"
    VERSION 1.0
    RESOURCE_PREFIX "/qt/qml"
    RESOURCES ${resPng} ${resSvg}
    RESOURCES
        ../resources/fonts/fonts.txt
        ../resources/database.sql
        ../resources/config.json
    RESOURCES
        utils.js
    QML_FILES App.qml
    QML_FILES
        Core/CDatabase.qml
        Core/CDataManager.qml
        Core/CViewManager.qml
        Core/CWorkspace.qml
        Core/CConfig.qml
    QML_FILES
        Design/CText.qml
        Design/CButton.qml
        Design/CIcon.qml
        Design/CHider.qml
        Design/CView.qml
        Design/CViewMenu.qml
        Design/CHSeparator.qml
        Design/CVSeparator.qml
    QML_FILES
        Forms/CCatalogForm.qml
        Forms/CStringForm.qml
        Forms/CPolyForm.qml
        Forms/CCheckForm.qml
        Forms/CDateTimeForm.qml
        Forms/CFormSelector.qml
    QML_FILES
        Views/Document/CDocumentView.qml
        Views/Map/CMapView.qml
        Views/Map/CMapMenu.qml
        Views/Map/CMapInfo.qml
        Views/Map/CMapLayers.qml
    QML_FILES
        Panels/CDocumentTypes.qml
        Panels/CDocumentList.qml
        Panels/CViewSelector.qml
        QML_FILES Design/CHeader.qml
)
